dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail dataset was constructed for the question answering task by creating questions about entities that appear in the reference summary. It contains 312,085 articles with relevant questions scraped from the two news agenciesâ€™ websites.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail Dataset

dcterms:creator: David Graff
Junbo Kong
Ke Chen
Kazuaki Maeda
dcterms:description: GigaWord is a large-scale dataset that provides a comprehensive collection of news articles, which can be used for various natural language processing tasks including summarization.
dcterms:title: GigaWord

dcterms:creator: Evan Sandhaus
dcterms:description: The New York Times Annotated Corpus is a dataset that contains articles from The New York Times, annotated for various linguistic features, which can be used for tasks such as summarization and information extraction.
dcterms:title: New York Times Annotated Corpus

dcterms:creator: Karolina Owczarzak
Hoa Trang Dang
dcterms:description: The TAC 2011 AESOP Task dataset includes source documents and reference summaries, along with manual metrics for evaluating summarization systems.
dcterms:title: TAC 2011 AESOP Task

dcterms:creator: Karolina Owczarzak
Hoa Trang Dang
dcterms:description: The AESOP Datasets are used for evaluating summarization systems, providing a set of documents and reference summaries along with manual evaluation metrics.
dcterms:title: AESOP Datasets
